body_html: This change is good, I think. But the fact that this survived indicates there's not enough test coverage of this code. Could you add a test which exercises the channels_first code path to make sure it works?

body: This change is good, I think. But the fact that this survived indicates there's not enough test coverage of this code. Could you add a test which exercises the `channels_first` code path to make sure it works?
